start_msg:
You find yourself trapped in a labyrinth.
Hurry up or you will be late for dinner !

needle.msg: [Mac Gyver] Let's put this needle in my pocket !

tube.msg: [Mac Gyver] An empty tube. If it's there it means I will need it.

ether.msg: [Mac Gyver] Damn, I thought it was alcohol. Whatever, I will take it anyway.

end_msg_win:
[Mac Gyver] It's time for your insulin injection !
[Guardian] Wait, I don't even have diab... *RONFLRRR*
[You escaped successfully !]
end_msg_lost:
*BLAM* *BLAM*
[Guardian] Who are you and what are you doing here ?!
[Mac Gyver] *AHRG* I'm dying...
[You are buried for eternity in the labyrinth]
